title: FloodList
description: Floods and flooding news from around the world

items.title: Germany – Thousands Evacuate Floods in Bavaria and Baden-Wuerttemberg
items.description: Thousands of people have evacuated their homes in southern Germany after heavy rain caused multiple rivers to break their banks. At least two people have died and another is reported…

items.title: Afghanistan – Devastating Flash Floods Claim Hundreds of Lives in Northern Provinces
items.description: Flash floods triggered by heavy rains have left a trail of devastation in northern Afghanistan, claiming the lives of hundreds of people. The catastrophic floods struck on 10 to 11…

items.title: Oman – Dozens Rescued, 12 Dead After Heavy Rain Triggers Flash Floods
items.description: Heavy rainfall has caused widespread flash flooding in parts of Oman where authorities report at least 12 people have died. According to figures from Oman’s National Committee for Emergency Management,…

items.title: Uruguay – Thousands Evacuate As River Reaches Record High in Florida Department
items.description: Flooding in the department of Florida in the south of Uruguay has displaced almost 2,000 people after the Santa Lucía Chico River reached record highs. Six temporary evacuation centres have…
